### getAllMetadata() {#a3d200b1568f70b28ae0eb9bec58d6690}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void Value::getAllMetadata (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; std::pair&lt; unsigned, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; &gt; &gt; &amp; MDs) const</>}>
Appends all metadata attached to this value to <code>MDs</code>, sorting by KindID.

The first element of each pair returned is the KindID, the second element is the metadata value. Attachments with the same <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> appear in insertion order.
